specifications.Finish: Chemical > Enzyme Enzymes treatment offers a remarkably soft hand-feel by gently breaking down the fibers’ surface, resulting in a smoother and cleaner texture. This treatment also reduces pilling and fuzz, enhancing the fabric’s durability and maintaining a clean appearance
specifications.Dye Method: Pigment Dye Pigment dye applies color to the fabric surface without penetrating the fibers, creating a vintage, faded look. It offers a soft, unique appearance but may fade more easily with washing. Yarn Effect > Slub Slub yarn is made with varying thicknesses, causing the fabric to have a bumpy texture. It adds a unique texture and character to the fabric's surface.
specifications.Care Advice: Chemical > Enzyme Piece printing on enzyme/bio-washed fabric can cause staining. Therefore, please refrain from piece printing on this fabric. Dye Method > Pigment Dye Pigment dyed fabrics are intended to fade and alter in color gradually over time. so it requires special care in handling.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not rub Do not bleach Line dry Do not iron Recommended Use Jeans, Outer, Cargo Pants
